title: Easy soft cinnamon pretzels
ingredients: ['15g active dry yeast', '5g caster sugar', '300ml finger-warm water', '630g strong bread flour', '100g caster sugar', '8g salt', '15ml vegetable oil', '50g bicarbonate of soda', '450ml hot water (hand hot)', 'cinnamon and caster sugar mixed, as needed', 'pure cane sugar syrup, as needed']
